posts.post_content:
I have saved my pennies and am ready to send them to someone else in exchange for a small piece of cardboard.  (If you really want pennies, perhaps, we can work something out) :D

My only real requirements are that the card be PSA graded (preferably in the 4, 4.5, 5 range), solid centering, and color.

Please send scans and asking prices in my direction and if we can work something out, I can drive my truck of pennies to your place.  

Thanks!!!

[quote name="Cmount76" post=1382032]I have saved my pennies and am ready to send them to someone else in exchange for a small piece of cardboard.  (If you really want pennies, perhaps, we can work something out) :D

My only real requirements are that the card be PSA graded (preferably in the 4, 4.5, 5 range), solid centering, and color.

Please send scans and asking prices in my direction and if we can work something out, I can drive my truck of pennies to your place.  

Thanks!!![/QUOTE]

I haven't seen any of those on any auction sites  with no reserve in about a year...maybe a psa 4 not without solid centering color...but not a psa 5..if I see anything ill let you know..

one selling at pwcc auction ebay .psa 4..biddign at 4100 or so at time of this post..with a few mins left on ebay  piedmont

[url]http://www.ebay.com/itm/400872704164?_trksid=p2060778.m1431.l2649&ssPageName=STRK%3AMEBIDX%3AIT[/url]

happy bidding


---just sold for 4500

Thanks for the heads-up.  I was actually following it and placed (what I thought to be) a VERY fair bid.  Unfortunately, it went for $4500, which I felt was a little strong.  


Thanks for looking out though!
